Included instructions didn't fully work for me, however after some guessing I got it to work. Here you go for anyone wanting to try them:
1. Open "Windows XP Keygen" and select "Windows XP Pro." (NOT "Windows XP Pro. VDK") and click "Generate"
2. Open "keyfinder", go to the "Options" menu and click "Change Windows Key" then in the window that comes up enter the key made in step 1 then exit "keyfinder".
3. Open "wga-fix" and click "Yes"
4. Open "MGADiag" and click "Continue" then "OK"
5. Go to Start Menu - All Programs - Activate Windows - and enter the product key from step 1.
6. Your finished.

So far I've been able to fully use Windows Update and have used the OS about an hour now in a VM, not a single problem but will see how it goes in the long run. Either way thanks!
